title: New Cyber Nidalee Skin Idea with Concept Art
body:
Hey guys,

I had this idea of a tech based Nidalee skin. So I decided to draw it:

http://imgur.com/uyKHyRj

Human Form
Q - The spear tip is made from blue plasma energy.
W - A trap with a detector in the middle and springs together like a bear trap.
E - Looks kind of like the recalling but more blue and fades off into pixels.
R - Nidalee fades into glowing blue pixels which form into a cougar shape and then fade into the cougar form of the skin.

Cougar Form
Q - The blue lines glow brighter and when the attack is used some blue pixels or sparks fly off.
W - A small trail of blue pixels during the jump.
E - Similar to the regular Swipe, but blue.
R - Vice versa of the Human Form.

Please comment if you like it or if you have any further ideas.

replies.body: It looks pretty awesome. It seems quite similar in a sense to the Headhunter Nidalee because she has cyberish animations. She also has a lot of skins too so I personally with your artistic skills try and find maybe heroes with limited skins. Like Diana! x

Thanks.
I mainly chose to create a Nidalee skin because she is currently my favourite champion, but I will try to create more skin ideas for other champions with less skins and hopefully riot might get some ideas (rather than making _another_ Teemo skin)
XD
